attributes.action: TO ARREST BENJAMIN NETANYAHU WHEN HE COMES TO BRITAIN,HE IS A WAR CRIMINAL.
attributes.background: BENJAMIN NETANYAHU IS A WAR CRIMINAL,HE MUST BE TRIED FOR WAR CRIMES IN THE HAGUE,HE MUST BE ARRESTED WHEN HE LANDS ON BRITISH SOIL.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105446

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
